node.title: Porirua scrub fire halts traffic and trains
node.description: Fire crews are attending a scrub fire between the motorway and railway tracks on State Highway 59 in Porirua.
node.content:
["Fire crews are attending a scrub fire between the motorway and railway tracks on State Highway 59 in Porirua.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Claire Eastham-Farrelly\n
", "Fire crews were called at 4pm to the fire near the Titahi Bay on/off ramp.", "The fire was about 50 metres wide at its peak, but Fire and Emergency said its size had since reduced.", "The Northbound lane is down to one lane, and both the ramp heading south and north onramp are closed.", "Meanwhile, train services on the K\u0101piti Line have been suspended between Porirua and Paek\u0101k\u0101riki."]
